---
name: "User Story"
about: "Template for user stories"
title: "[Feature]: "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: ""
---

**As a** [user],  
**I need** [feature],  
**So that** [goal].  

### Acceptance Criteria:  
- Given [context],  
- When [action],  
- Then [expected result].  

### Additional Notes:  
[Add any additional context here.]
